lead_paragraph: This economics of tiny things demonstrates the global power of the few companies, including Amazon, Microsoft and Google, that can make fortunes from the small.

headline.print_headline: Billing by Millionths of Pennies, Cloud Computing Giants Make Billions
headline.main: Billing by Millionths of Pennies, Cloud Computing’s Giants Take In Billions

snippet: This economics of tiny things demonstrates the global power of the few companies, including Amazon, Microsoft and Google, that can make fortunes from the small.
abstract: Cloud computing giants like Amazon Web Services are using pay model in which they charge tiny price for very small actions, which is resulting in billion-dollar business; pay model was pioneered by Amazon, and underscores degree to which industry is solely province of extremely large companies.
